dict.acceptation: 便士；（美国、加拿大的）一分钱；少量的钱；

sent.orig: Six months of pre-school for Penny.
38 A penny saved is a penny gained.
A penny saved is a penny earned.
sent.trans: 省一便士就是挣一便士。

sent.orig: But penny by penny, the mortgage giant Fannie Mae is being salvaged in the stock market.
sent.trans: 但是房地产贷款业的巨头房利美，却在股票市场中被一分一厘的投资所救赎。

sent.orig: Penny and penny laid up will be many.
